long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How It Works:

üí≥ Shop: Head to the site you want to shop at, and our extension will notify you if you can earn cash back. Click the ‚ÄúActivate‚Äù button, then shop like normal.

üí∏ Earn:  Get up to 20% of your purchase value as cash back AND raise money for charity with each purchase. You can rack up serious savings when you shop fashion, travel, & more!

ü§ù Redeem: Cash out via PayPal or donate more to one of our partner charities at a higher, matched rate.

üîî Never Miss a Deal: Add our extension, and we'll remind you to activate deals when you shop at hundreds of stores. Get money back and raise some serious donations with just one click!

Why Use AllGives?

üìà Unbeatable Rates Guaranteed: Our cash back rates are 3x higher on average than others. If you find a better public offer on another site, let us know and we'll beat it guaranteed.

üíØ Reliable Savings: We're WAY better than other coupon and cashback sites - we work 100% of the time and respond to all questions in under 36 hours with our US-based team. 

üéâ Easy Money, Big Impact: Our platform is a free and easy way for you to save on your shopping while supporting impactful charities. No coupon codes. No gift cards. No tricks. 

So why wait? Add the AllGives extension to your browser and stop overpaying when you shop!
